name: NetansNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: NetAns News skill provides information about the latest gadgets, technology and telecom related news published on the tech blog - netans.com. You will be able to listen to the latest tech news including reviews on a daily basis. The aim of the skill is to push the original content on the cloud by tapping the rich potential of Amazon Alexa. You require any one of the Amazon echo devices and also should activate the skill from the Amazon Alexa app.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
